entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
